oracle.adf.view.rich.event
Class CalendarDisplayChangeEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      javax.faces.event.FacesEvent
          oracle.adf.view.rich.event.CalendarDisplayChangeEvent

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CalendarDisplayChangeEvent
extends javax.faces.event.FacesEvent

The calendarDisplayChange event is delivered when some display change is made, for example the view is changed from month to day.

See Also:
Serialized Form
